verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
1.Njooni wapenzi tufanye shangwe
mwokozi Bwana amefufuka

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Viumbe vyote tufanye shangwe
mwokozi Bwana amefufuka

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Na tufanye shangwe twimbe aleluya
mwokozi Bwana amefufuka

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
4.Kwa ufufufuko wako ee Bwana-
Umeturudishia uzima-

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
5.Umewashinda adui zetu-
Mauti kali pia shetani-

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
6.Enzi ni yako ya umilele-
shukrani sifa na utukufu

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
7.Hii ndiyo siku iliyofanywa-
na Mungu nayo ni ya furaha-
